name: Spirit Knight (Crizchan)
description:
Spirit Knight
This is a 2D puzzler where the knight(You) has a weird ability where you can detach your own soul to your body and attach it to object. his main goal is to reach the final floor in order to retrieve his lost hands

How to Play  and Controls :
How to Play - dunno

Controls: 
R - Restart the Game (Press this when the Game Get Fucked up or Get Messy)

 Player State :

WASD - Movement
J - Become a Ghost

Rule: Player Body can interact Plates, switch and Keys but he cannot push the box

Ghost State

WASD - Movement
J -  To Possess Object (BOX Or Player)
K - Detach from the Possession

Rule:   Ghost  can pass thru object and can Possess it
(Tips : Explore before do things)
